channel.title: OmniGamers News & Events
channel.description: We are united as a community in our passion of gaming and making a difference! We schedule regular game events to bring everyone together to play new or familiar games and raise funds for charity!

item.title: Tifa Joins the Team!
item.description: I am glad to announce another creator, but this time, we have another artist joining the group! Please give a warm welcome to TifaDoesArt, now Mear won’t feel like the only artist! And we can force--I mean ask her to help out with graphical projects (lol just kidding)!
item.dc:creator: Wolfalamew

item.title: Summer Time Events!
item.description: After a hiatus last month, we're back with some events for the community! We're working hard on finding a solution to increase turn out for our events. This is a topic we'll be bringing up at our town hall meetings for a while. The reason is that it's much more fun...
item.dc:creator: Kryptix

item.title: A Fallout That Isn't Fallout
item.description: Right off the bat, I’m going to admit it: I love Fallout 4. Despite all its problems, the game was still enjoyable and worth the purchase now that the price has gone down. That being said, I’m no expert on Fallout games or Fallout 4 specifically. I own Fallout 1 and 3...
item.dc:creator: TwelvePointFive

item.title: June Town Hall Meeting
item.description: Heyo Guys! Well, here's another one, ALREADY?!? Yep! It's time for the monthly Town hall meeting and, though not much happened in May, it went pretty fast! We hope y'all had a great time, and now have a great summer! We have a lot of stuff to do now!
item.dc:creator: Wolfalamew

item.title: Our New Coordinator, Mear
item.description: We are happy to bring another new Coordinator onto the team, Mear! Mear has been with the community since the beginning and has shown interest in wanting to do more to help out! Mear is our key graphic artist, many of the graphics on the site and on other Creator's...
item.dc:creator: Kryptix

item.title: Remember What Memorial Day Stands For
item.description: This post to remind everyone to keep in mind what Memorial Day actually means. Many of us enjoy the longer weekend, celebrate it as the "official" start of Summer or a weekend to get some "great deals" with stores offering sales. Memorial Day is a day of reflection...
item.dc:creator: Kryptix

item.title: Server Hosting For You!
item.description: Hey everyone, we've got some exciting new things to show off today! We are proud to announce the first two dedicated game servers for OmniGamers! Currently the available servers are Factorio and Team Fortress 2.
item.dc:creator: TwelvePointFive

item.title: What the F...actorio?
item.description: Factorio has reached out and grasped onto my quite short attention span and has not seemed to want to let go. I had heard and seen videos of people saying that it is a game that would consume you. I had also heard the same about many games. None of the other games...
item.dc:creator: RedW1dow

item.title: Join Our Community Grid Team
item.description: One of the core values for OmniGamers is to help others. While we are still working on building our foundation to accept donations for charity, I'm happy to announce another way that all of us can contribute to something bigger than ourselves! A big thanks to Optaunix...
item.dc:creator: Kryptix

item.title: The Imbeciles Join the Team
item.description: We have something different joining us at OmniGamers! Instead of a individual Creator joining our team, we have a team joining our team! Imbeciles Play Games is joining the Creator team! These three friends have been playing games for years, but somehow, they aren't...
item.dc:creator: Wolfalamew
